scripts.start: npm run build:client && tsc && npm run copy-to-dist && node dist
scripts.build: npm run build:client && tsc --declaration && npm run copy-to-dist
scripts.build:client: cd ../client && npm run build && rm -rf ../api/public 2> /dev/null && cp -r dist ../api/public
scripts.copy-to-dist: cp -r public dist/public && cp package.json dist
